title: Importing IFC using ifc2gltf2xgf
description:
How to chain the ifc2gltf and ifc2gltf2xgf CLI tools together to convert an IFC model to XGF format, and then display the XGF in a xeokit web viewer.

XGF can load certain AEC models faster than glTF. This pipeline is our most performant option for larger IFC models.
